name: OPC Router Configuration 4 Project
summary: Learn about .RPE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To import an RPE file in OPC Router Configuration, select File → Import OPC Router 4 project, navigate to the RPE file, and click Open.
To export an RPE file in OPC Router Configuration, select File → Export OPC Router 4 project, click the ellipsis icon, name the RPE file, and click Save.
NOTE: OPC Router Configuration is used to establish connections between a wide variety of systems, such as PLCs, MQTT, SOAP, REST, databases, printers, and ERP systems.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
